Vulois/Terminess/Octociz and Bronco

Vulois hears Hell Beast's command. He'll talk about the lab later. 
Right now it's time to test out the TM3 body. He runs outside to see 
Predacons battling Newcomers. Vulois transforms to Tank Mode and 
loads his cannon. He starts randomly firing missles. He'll focus on a 
certain member soon, but first he wants his presence to be felt. He 
continues to fire missles.

______________________________________________________________________

Terminess was still walking around the Pred base when the alarm 
sounded: Someone was attacking!. She doesn't know much about 
fighting, so she decided her talents could be used best by 
controlling the ships guns from the main area. She transforms to 
Robot Mode and heads to the control room.


______________________________________________________________________

Octociz has reached the downed ship. No one appears to be inside. 
Maybe it was just a lost alien fighter in a battle. Just then Octociz 
was baraged by blaster fire. He was hit a few times in the head. He 
fell down, unconcious.

When he awoke, he was healed. He was, though, strappen to a wall in a 
strange cave. All sorts of scrap medal was around, as if someone was 
trying to build something. Octociz turned his head, and their was a 
giant bot, trying to use the scrap medal to his advantage.

"I see you woke up."

"Who are you?" demanded Octociz

"The name's Brocno. I'm a renegade bounty hunter. I capture and 
torture bots so that I may get something from their side. You're 
going to be my first victim."

"What do you want from me?"

"You're about to find out." Brocno said as he activated his 
comlink. "Maximal base! This Bronco, a new bot in the Neo Beast Wars. 
I'm needing technology to help build my base. I have captured one of 
your kind, named Octociz. If you want him back alive than you will 
give me on tracking computer. And no attacks, or he gets it. And to 
prove I'm not bluffing...."

Bronco takes out his gun and fires right at Octociz' shoulder. Mech 
fluid was leaking out, and Octociz screamed.

"Ahhhhh!!!!!! Maximals, please....help me...."

Octociz went unconcious again. Bronco continued.

"Meet me by the cliff where the Axalon went down in 5 mega-cycles, or 
Octociz gets it."
